commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This is what we've come up with. What do you think?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Wow, so many suggestions!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: We had ideas popping out from left, right, and center when we looked at the photos you sent us.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I hope some of our ideas are useful.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think they're all great ideas!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, we can totally tell you guys have run an event before, looking at all these ideas. They're awesome!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: This suggestion here comes with a special recommendation. I came up with it myself!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Uhh, I think we should pass on that one. YO, SHE KOuld do without it, Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It's not Yoshiko, it's Yohane! And don't call me that just to pull off some pun!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I think that's all she was angling for. But I'm gonna have to agree that we should pass on this suggestion.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We said it was impossible as well, zura.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Well, maybe we could make something of it if we tweak her suggestion a bit. The concept itself is pretty good.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Everything's all coming together!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah! It's like all of the ideas we conjured up are fitting together, one by one, like little puzzle pieces.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I bet the festival will be a ton of fun if we pull everything off!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We should do everything we wanna do now that we've come this far!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Right! It's a festival, after all!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: With so many suggestions, I don't think they'll all fit into one day.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We don't have to make it fit into one day, do we?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hold up! Do you think you can book me, the number one idol in the whole universe, for several days?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You're right, it is pretty jam-packed. I bet we'll never forget this experience if we manage to make it a reality.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Don't ignore what I just said!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yeah, yeah, we'll ask you to sort out your schedule for us separately, Nico-chi.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Give me an early heads-up, okay?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Now that we've sorted out Nico-chi's schedule... Hmm, they all sound like such amazing ideas. Maybe we're squeezing a little too much in?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I concur.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I think having it a little jam-packed is just right for a festival.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It is necessary for it to be thoroughly managed and run. We must organize all of these ideas. This is also to avoid any hiccups as we go along.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What are you worried about? Getting too busy?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Perhaps our biggest problem is...staffing?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Yeah, we have to think about how many people we'll need to help out for an event of this scale. We also should research materials and construction to build the stages.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. It does sound like there's a limit to what we can do for those aspects.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I fully believe we cannot do this just on our own.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But Aqours has experience running an event, right?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We cannot offer our insight as we do not have experience designing and setting up this many booths.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Should we just bring more people on if we don't have enough? Some people offered their help when we went around collecting signatures, you know?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I think we would still struggle if we only gathered ten or twenty people. We also need a certain amount of expertise...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We cannot put forth our suggestions to Shioriko until we have figured this out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I have a few connections when it comes to expert knowledge.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I got to know the managers of each club when I helped out for the school tour, so I went over to discuss the School Idol Festival with them.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, when we said we might interrupt their club activity time...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A bunch of them said they wanted to help out!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The art club said they wanted to make the signs for us, and stagehands in the theater club said they want to try setting up the stages.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Really?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The broadcasting club, music club, and concert band said they'd help with sound and music. The cooking club and life design girls also offered to run the food stands.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Wow!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: D-Doesn't it feel like we've pretty much solved a bunch of our problems already?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I highly admire how quickly you spring to action.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're all over this!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Thanks.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We haven't sorted everything out, but at least now we can hold some hope for success.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We should get even more clubs and associations involved now that things are coming together!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I totally agree! I'm gonna ask all the girls at Uranohoshi too!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: This sounds like so much fun!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'll talk to everyone at school too!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We're getting all of our schools involved because this is a school idol cultural festival, right? You've got my vote.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, everyone! Let's hit the ground running to invite as many clubs and associations from our respective schools as possible by our next regular meeting!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
